text: Jochen Borchert (born 25 April 1940) is a German politician. He was born in Nahrstedt, Stendal. Borchert is a member of the CDU. He was Minister of Food, Agriculture and Consumer Protection in Chancellor Helmut Kohl's cabinet from 1993 to 1998. From 1980 to 2009 he has been a member of the Bundestag. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jochen Borchert's website * Biography by German Bundestag Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany Category:Politicians from Saxony-Anhalt Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany Category:Agriculture ministers of Germany
title: Jochen Borchert
